title: What do you think of the PvE ally bots?
body:
The PvE ally bots are substantially worse than the PvE enemy bots.

* They take Ghost + Heal, but cheat  using flash anyway
* They buy boots first thing
* They select a random lane, irrespective of champion
* They often take two or three turret hits level one
* They frequently charge into unwinnable packs of enemies to die
* They often disconnect

replies.body: Of course they're worse. They're not developed by third-party account sellers making do with pre-planned sequences, image scanning, etc., while Riot's bots are actually connected to the game. Calling them "PvE ally bots" compared to "PvE enemy bots" is a gross mislabeling.
